    EffectiveWaves.match_arrays — Function.

    Returns (LT, ER, (imk^2invw).invVconj(wvec)), which connect the effective and average wave through α = LTA + (imk^2inv_w).invV*conj(w_vec). The matching region is X[L:end].

    EffectiveWaves.match_error — Function.

    Calculates the difference between the match of MatchWave.effectivewaves and MatchWave.averagewave. This can be used as a proxi for convergence.

    EffectiveWaves.maximum_hankel_order — Function.

    Calculate the largest needed order for the hankel series.

    EffectiveWaves.one_species_low_wavenumber — Function.

    low volfrac and low wavenumber. Fails badly for strong scatterers

    EffectiveWaves.p_speed — Function.

    Returns pressure wave speed, when β is the adiabatic bulk modulus/

    EffectiveWaves.pair_field_pattern
    EffectiveWaves.reduce_kvecs
    EffectiveWaves.reduced_amplitudes_effective — Function.

    The average effective transmitted scattering amplitudes for a given effective wavenumber keff. Assumes there exists only one keff. The function returns an array A, where AA(x,y,m,s) = im^mexp(-immθ_eff)A[m + maxhankelorder +1,s]exp(imkeff*(cos(θeff)x + sin(θin)y)) where (x,y) are coordinates in the halfspace, m-th hankel order, s-th species, and AA is the ensemble average scattering coefficient.

    EffectiveWaves.reflection_coefficient — Function.

    Calculates the reflection coefficient from each wave in waves and then sums the results.

    The average reflection coefficient

    EffectiveWaves.reflection_coefficient_halfspace — Function.

    the reflection from a homogenious halfspace, which is also the low frequency reflection from a particulate material when using the effective_medium.

    EffectiveWaves.reflection_coefficient_low_volfrac — Function.

    An explicit formula for the refleciton coefficient based on a low particle volume fraction.

    EffectiveWaves.reflection_coefficients — Function.

    The average reflection coefficients

    Pairs each ω in ωs with each wave in waves to calculate the refleciton coefficients: reflection_coefficient(ω, wave)

    EffectiveWaves.scale_amplitudes_effective — Function.

    returns a number a, such that a*As_eff will cancel an incident wave plane wave with incident angle θin.

    EffectiveWaves.scattering_amplitudes_average
    EffectiveWaves.simpson_scheme
    EffectiveWaves.t_vectors — Function.

    A t_matrix in the form of a vector, because for now we only deal with diagonal T matrices.

    calculate effective transmission angle
